DryadDataFile.dcterms:title: Raw body mass data for bird species
DryadDataFile.dcterms:description: These are raw body mass measurements from the vertnet.org specimen database that have already been subject to extensive quality control. All columns other than species binomial and mass in grams have been stripped away; this is the minimal information required to do the bootstrap resampling to recreate the analysis in the manuscript.
DryadDataFile.dcterms:subject: body size
niche
macroecology
birds
